item.title: Example Content with Header Image
item.author: jhondoe@gmail.com (John Doe)
item.description: How to config add header? # You must add images field array and paste image url in array.

item.title: Example Disable ToC (Table Of Content)
item.author: jhondoe@gmail.com (John Doe)
item.description: How to configure disable toc? # You need to add the toc:false .

item.title: Example with ToC (Table Of Content)
item.author: jhondoe@gmail.com (John Doe)
item.description: How to configure enable toc? # By default toc is enable, and And if you want to make sure the toc is active, you need to add the toc:true .
